title: Pick two champions, they produce a baby, how does the baby turn out? [Prize]
body:
Janna and Yasuo

Baby Name: Windy
Gender: Male
**Passive:** 
Grants nearby allies a constant movement speed bonus and shields allies from a % of damage) 
**Q- Super Tornado** 
(like Janna's Tornado but it crits anything in its path) 
**W- Exotic Defense **
(like Yasuo's wind wall but surrounds Windy 360 degrees and speed buffs him while simultaneously slowing enemy champions around him. Follows him around for the duration)
**E- Defensive Dash** 
(dashes forward and shields Windy)
**R- Hurricane Slash**
 (Pushes enemy champions away and into the air. Windy then blinks to the knocked up champions dealing massive amount of damage while healing himself and his allies nearby for the knock up duration)

replies.body:
{{champion:82}} and {{champion:37}} 

**Persephone**

Passive: Iron Maiden
Persephone shields herself for 25% of the magic damage she deals while generating a charge of "Melodic Malevolence" with every spell cast, at 4 stacks her next Spell has an additional effect

Q: Flail of Valor
Persephone's next three AA's lash out at two champion in her vicinity, the third strike dealing twice the damage
Passive bonus; The damage is dealt to every unit in her vicinity

W: Symphony of Souls
Persephone surrounds herself and an allied champion with undead spirits, dealing damage in an AoE as well as healing both of them for up to 50% of the damage dealt
Passive bonus; The heal and shield gained from this ability is increased by 50%

E: Solemn Lament
Persephone blasts an area around her with deathly energies, dealing AoE damage to every unit struck while gaining up to 15% maximum shield from every champion hit
Passive bonus; Units hit by Solemn Lament have their movement speed drained

R: Mistress of Puppets
Persephone sends out a wave of Necromantic energies in an area in front of her, forcing every unit struck to dance for 2 seconds, enemies who die during the duration become undead thralls, which Persephone can control

{{champion:238}} {{champion:64}} 

Their manlove child will be called" Balanced"

Passive: "Balance"  cooldowns reduced every time he auto attacks

Q: "S-kill shot" launches a shadow shrukin from a kick that passes through minions damaging them and marks the first champion hit.
! reactivated: "Muh skillcap reward" dashes to enemy dealing 150% ad + a rising percentage of targets max hp, based off missing health

W: "Learn How To Dodge" a instant cast point blank aoe nuke slow scaling off of AD, 

E: "Just Counterpick Me Bro"  Summons a mark that can replicate all damaging abilities, or be teleported to instantly if reactivated up to 2000 range. 

R: "Calculation Mechanic"  Teleports to enemy, gains bonus activation range and deals 250% bonus ad + execute damage + a free cooldown reset on e to dash back and stuns the affected champion hit for 2.5 seconds and nearby champions for 0.75 seconds. 

Yes he will be manaless, since energy is allegedly hard to manage and "if he had mana he would have to be buffed to compensate"

{{champion:268}}, {{champion:134}}, {{champion:107}} and {{champion:157}}

Name: Bugmaster

Passive: Aura of glitches. Everyone, ally and enemy, within 2000 range gets plagued by bugs.

Q: Bugsplat. Targeted ability. Like the name suggests, the target gets bugsplatted

This is Bugmaster's most important laning ability. By continuously making the enemy's client crash, he can effectively trade and farm.

W: Spaghetti code. Bug places a pile of spaghetti on the ground. The pile is so big that it falls through the Rift, leaving a permanent hole in there. Anyone who falls through the hole completely bugs out, because spaghetti.

A very strong but situational ability. Correct usage can remove enemies from a fight or save allies, but just like Bard's ult it can also go completely wrong.

E: Connection error. A fast-moving projectile that flies in random directions. Every time Bugmaster hits an enemy with this ability, he permanently gains a stack of lag. His base ping is multiplied by his stacks.

This ability allows for great lategame scaling. Playing around the RNG of it is what separates the good Bugmasters from the great ones.

R: Delete system32. After channeling for 3 seconds, Bugmaster completely removes the system files from all enemies' PCs.

Bugmaster gains a lot of power from his ult. However, the mana cost and CD are very high, so he will need to think twice before using it, as entering a fight without it makes him a lot weaker.

{{champion:136}} and {{champion:161}} 

**Baby name**: Armageddon
**Gender**: Unknown

**Passive**: (Center of Deconstruction) 
Stars orbit Armageddon, dealing magic damage when they hit an enemy. Passive and basic abilities apply Organic Deconstruction to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.

**Q**: (Plasma Surge)
creates an expanding disk, which splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy, then explodes to stun and damage enemies.

**W**: (Celestial Rift)
Opens a rift to the void that deals constant damage and pushes Armageddons stars farther out, magnifying their damage (think {{champion:34}} ult in the form of {{champion:161}} W with the addition of {{champion:136}} W)

**E**:  (Comet of Disruption)
gains speed while moving in one continuous direction, and can eventually take off flying for a long distance. Stopping causes the area under Armageddon to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away

**R**: (Voice of Disintegration) 
projects a channelled beam of pure starfire that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds, damaging and slowing all enemies caught in it and knocking nearby enemies back to a safer distance. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.

{{champion:56}} and {{champion:67}} 

**Nyx**

Gender: Female 

Passive: Dread Stalker 
 
Nyx is able to ignore minion block and gains permanent bonus MS whenever she kills or assist in eliminating an enemy champion. She only gets the maximum amounts of stacks for each unique enemy champion killed or assisting in killing. 

Q: Realm of Shadows 

Nyx fires out a shadow blade that leaves a Shadow Trail. This Shadow Trail gives her increase attack damage and attack speed for the duration of the Shadow Trail. Enemy Champions that are either hit or walk over the Shadow Trail have the Shadow Trail follow them. 

W: Crimson Terror

Passive: Nyx Umbra Blades grants her passive life-steal and increases based on how much health she is missing

Active: Nyx's Umbra Blades become empowered by her inner darkness of hatred and misery, allowing her to give her auto attacks true damage for a short duration as well as increasing her AA range. 

E: Baleful Torment

Passive: Nyx is granted a massive burst of movement speed for whenever a nearby enemy champion is feared or having their vision reduced 

Active: Nyx channels horrible visions of nightmares and the deepest fears of her targeted enemy champion, at the end of the channel, the enemy champion is feared and remains slowed for a short duration once the fear is over.

R: Eternal Nightmare

Nyx drastically reduces the sight radius of enemy champion on the map  and removes their ally vision as well with Paranioa. She can launch herself at an enemy champion and deals physical damage to them. She can increase the duration of this Paranioa  for every champion kill or assist she receives during the duration of her ultimate.

{{champion:17}} + {{champion:18}} =

Name: Trismo
Gender: Male
Passive:
Everytime an enemy dies within range of him, he gains extra AP and AD for a short time (Effect stacks if more die in the process.)

Q:
Jumps on an enemy, blinds him with a knife stab, then bounces back. The next auto attack will make him dash to the enemy and deal 10%/20%/30%/40%/50% of his next auto attack damage (If AP damage is dealt, it also applies it.)

W:
Dashes away, gaining a short burst of Movement speed that decays over time for 4 seconds. If an enemy is killed or assisted against, the cooldown is reset.

E:
Auto attacks deal scaling magic damage on hit only passively. If activated, his attack speed increases by 5%/10%/15%/20%/25% for a short time.

R:
Throws out a shroom that blinds anyone inside the explosion radius and deals little magic damage over time.

{{champion:96}} and {{champion:121}} 

Name: Lok'Mix, the reciever of the void 

Gender: Unknown (a member of the Xoa'Mix species)

--Passive: Thirst for hunger
-Lok'Mix does not have mana, he instead has nourishment (up to 200)
-While **Voracious**, Lok'Mix's basic attacks generates 10 stacks of nourishment
-While **Sated**, Lok'Mix's basic attacks cost 10 stacks of nourishment
-Stacks of nourishment increase Lok'Mix's attack damage but reduce his attack speed (don't really know about the values)
-If a **Sated** Lok'Mix hits 0 stacks, he will become **Voracious** after 5 seconds no matter what
Nourishment des NOT deplete or regenerate on its own 

--Q: Icathian Claim/Gain
While **Voracious** [Icathian Claim]: No cost
Lok'Mix stops moving for one second and drains life all around him, dealing damage to all enemies present, healing itself for 20% of the damage dealt and gaining stacks of nourishment

_Evolved Icathian Claim_: Deals 50% more damage to marked targets

While **Sated** [Icathian Gain]: Cost: 20 Nourishment stacks
Lok'Mix will deal damage in a small zone after a short delay (range is the same as the attack range). Lok'Mix gains 20 stacks of nourishment per champion hit and 5 per minion/monster hit (can apply on up to 3 minions/monsters), doubled on large (or epic) minions or monsters

_Evolved Icathian Gain_: if it hits a champion, it will deal 20% more damage, slow him down, reduce his armor and mr by 20% and marks him, making him visible

--W: Satiate/Insatiate
No cost
While **Voracious** [Satiate]: becomes **Sated**
While **Sated** [Insatiate]: becomes **Voracious**
**Voracious** bonuses: Lok'Mix is melee, has 350 movement speed, has more ad, has scaling mr per level, more hp... is basically melee
**Sated** bonuses: Lok'Mix is ranged, has 325 movement speed, has more attack speed.... is basically ranged
Using this ability grants a small bonus of movement speed and a very small bonus of armor and mr. Updrading this ability increases these values

_Evolved Satiate/Insatiate_: the **Voracious** gains 30 movespeed , and 100 out of combat, the **Sated** gains 120 attack range

--E: Assault/Voidy Shooter
Cost: 10 nourishment
While **Voracious** [Assault]: Lok'Mix channels for 1 second and teleports a short distance

_Evolved Assault_: the channel time is shorter and kills reset the ability cooldown

While **Sated** [Voidy Shooter]: Lok'Mix sends a double basic attack at an enemy, deally 150% physical damage, an ap ratio (don't know for the values) and applying on-hit effects twice 

_Evolved Void Shooter_: Sends 3 attacks instead of 2 (200% physical damage) and deals additional magic damage (scales on ap) over time after the third attack

--R: Long Range Meal
Cost: 5 nourishment stacks

Passive: Ranking up Long Range Meal will enable Lok'Mix to evole one of his abilities

Active:
Fires an artillery shot. Works exaclty like Kog'Maw's ultimate (damage, range increase with levels, etc...)
While **Voracious**, the bonus damage of the target under 50% health is increased by 10%, and the bonus of an under 25% health target is increased by 20%
While **Sated**, the damage is increased by 15% when the target has more than 50%
any subsequent shot will increase the cost of this ability by 10 stacks of nourishment (max cost 75)

_Evolved Long Range Meal_: doubles the **Sated/Voracious** damage bonuces and killing an enemy champion will refund the last shot and reset the cost increase


This champion can be played as a mage, a marksman or a fighter (off-meta tank if you want)

Baby Name: Sneaky Sam

Deals 10% more damage to crowd controlled targets, and deals 10% of their maximum health as magic damage when auto attacked below 50% health.

Rakes blades out in every direction, dealing damage and slowing.
R- Death Assault
Teleports to target and becomes invisible for 1.5 seconds, sending blades out in every direction that return, and also gains .ovement speed. After 3 seconds, deals a portion of the damage done to the target in the last 3 seconds again.

Name: Nathan Explosion
Gender: Male

**Brütal (passive):** 
Nathan sustains himself in battle, healing him for 25% of the damage dealt by his abilities.

**Face Fisted (Q):** 
Nathan takes 25% less damage and his next 3 basic attacks to deal more damage based on the damage taken by nathan for the duration and make the target bleed for 5 seconds.

**Go Forth And Die (W):** 
Nathan dashes in a direction dealing damage,knocking back and making the target bleed for 5 seconds.

**Bloodrocuted (E):** 
Nathan empowers himself with the power of thunder, dealing damage over time in an area around him. if the targets are bleeding they're stunned.

{{champion:81}} and{{champion:44}} 

Champion Name: Lisa

Short Range Mage with mobility, tankiness, and cc as well as sustain, and OUTRAGEOUS burst.

She utilizes Ezreal's Magic with Taric's Gems to amplify her power.

Passive: OUTRAGEOUS Power

Every time Lisa uses a skill, she takes reduced damage. This passive stacks up to three times, for a total of 15%~30% damage reduction.

Q: Vigorious Rubies 

Lisa fires out a ruby. This spell can be cast three times. If she hits one, it deals damage. If two, the second does slightly reduced damage but slows. If three, she deals reduced damage on both the second and third ruby, but it stuns for 1.5 seconds.

W: Sapphire Flux

Lisa used a Sapphire to concentrate Ezreal's old Essence Flux, and heals for 50-200 health based on rank. It also reduces enemy Attack Speed and AP if she strikes them. This skill is a skill shot.

E: Emerald Splash

Lisa Blinks forward, becoming untargetable for 0.5 Seconds. If she blinks on top of an enemy, she deals magic damage and blinds them for 1 second with the fabulous lights.

R: Crazy Diamond

Lisa channels the powers of her fathers and fires a beam of truly pure power. Enemy's struck by this take magic damage and are charmed for 1.5-2.5 seconds.

{{champion:51}} +{{champion:254}}  
Name: Cai
Gender: Female 
Passive: Cai will crit every 8/7/6/5/4th auto attack, and will also crit marked targets. When she crits, she also gains a shield.
Q: Cai will charge up, slowing herself by a certain amount and throwing out a shot dealing damage that gets reduced by each enemy hit. Once activated again, Cai will charge forward, dealing damage and knocking up the 1st champion hit. 
W: Cai passively deals percentage health bonus damage w/ armor shred on every 3rd autoattack. Once this ability is activated, Cai will throw down a trap, and can store up to 3/4/5 traps at once. Traps will reveal any champion that steps on them and will mark them for x seconds.
E: Cai blasts herself in a certain direction, throwing a net while she does so. If the net lands the target, it marks the target and explodes, dealing damage in a cone behind the enemy. This net also procs on hit effects.
R: Cai snipes out a target and shoots an extremely accurate bullet that does an immense amount of damage. Then, Cai will charge towards the target, knocking other enemies out of the way and locking the target down, doing damage to all in her path (this is basically an extreme version of lee sin Q :P)

Q (human forum) Shadow play - Steal the targets shadow causing a tether between the two. The target takes 2.5% max hp damage per second. The only way to break the tether is to run to your shadow and reclaim it.

Q (dragon forum) Shadow fire  Breath - Burns enemies in a cone in front of Scath. Targets affected by nightfall take additional damage.
